long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search Easy - Default Search Extension

By clicking 'Add to Chrome,' you accept and agree to install Search-Easy, set it as your default search tool, agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy, and Default Search setting will be provide by Microsoft Bing.

Terms of Use: https://search-easy.com/terms.html
Privacy Policy: https://search-easy.com/privacy.html
Contact: https://search-easy.com/contact.html
